snippet.title: Official RPG Gameplay Trailer | MINDFLUX: Dead Man Walking
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2912780/MINDFLUX_Dead_Man_Walking/

A new narrative experience inspired by old school RPGs. 

Play as a mechanized monstrosity hunting down a heinous killer in the dystopian Rusted Future. Meet dynamic characters. Augment your personality and uncover their secrets. Discover the Truth.

Website: https://lostgatestudios.com
Twitter: https://x.com/LostGateStudios
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/salix-augeat
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lostgatestudios/
Discord: https://discord.gg/EJdyQc7c7D

Character Asset Photo Credit: Adam Kaufman
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/3EqBNJ
